This one has a medium video quality though.

If there is an english subtitle *.srt I use VLC and give the *.srt the same name as the *.avi. Then it works also when you convert the movie with winavi for playing on your television. You can also chose in Vlc  without renamning, only for use on your PC.

The subs work great, the video quality is decent but tolerable. Thanks for the upload!

\how to get the subs to work:
Make sure the subs (srt file) and the movie (avi file)
are in the same folder

Delete the English or Dutch subs.

Name the remaining srt file exactly the same as your .avi,

and now it should work.
if not, try vlc media player
